This route needs a strong PC: Core i5, GTX550 and 8GB RAM. Check if your computer complies with these requirements.

From   SBB 1 Manual for SBB System requirements:  
 -  Simulator:      Train Simulator 2012 Railworks 3 
-  Operating system:   Windows XP / Vista / Win 7 
-  Processor (CPU):     2.6 GHz (for Vista and 7) 
-  Main memory:     at least 2 GB RAM 
-  Graphic card:     Geforce速 NVidia or  ATI Radeon速 with at least 256 MB 
-  Additionally:     DirectX: 9.0c or higher 

So stop trolling vindicador...
